definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Rapunzel grew into the most beautiful child beneath the sun.
sentences.chinese: “莴苣”慢慢长成了天底下最漂亮的女孩。

sentences.english: A point on the celestial sphere directly below the observer, diametrically opposite the zenith.
sentences.chinese: 天底天球上，在观测者垂直向下的一点，与天。

sentences.english: We’ve all been taught that nothing is truly free, right?
sentences.chinese: 我们全都被教导过天底下没有免费的午餐，对吗？

sentences.english: Personally, I worry about something else—on behalf of job-seekers everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 就个人而言，我倒为天底下的求职者们担心别的事情。

sentences.english: A little more lightheartedness would render me the happiest being under the sun.
sentences.chinese: 哦，只要稍为愉快一点，我就是天底下最幸福的人了。

sentences.english: Was losing my job the worst thing in the world?
sentences.chinese: 丢掉工作真是天底下最糟的事吗？

sentences.english: Yellow Emperor is the best one who can spell out Tao.
sentences.chinese: 黄帝真是天底下，最能将道理说得精辟透彻的人了。

definition: to agree implicitly/of one mind/views coincide without a word exchanged

the twelve equatorial constellations or signs of the zodiac in Western astronomy and astrology, namely: Aries 白羊[Bai2 yang2], Taurus 金牛[Jin4 niu2], Gemini 雙子|双子[Shuang1 zi3], Cancer 巨蟹[Ju4 xie4], Leo 獅子|狮子[Shi1 zi3], Virgo 室女[Shi4 nu:3], Libra 天秤[Tian1 cheng4], Scorpio 天蠍|天蝎[Tian1 xie1], Sagittarius 人馬|人马[Ren2 ma3], Capricorn 摩羯[Mo2 jie2], Aquarius 寶瓶|宝瓶[Bao3 ping2], Pisces 雙魚|双鱼[Shuang1 yu2]
